STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Enchant creature with another Aura attached to it
Enchanter: créature avec une autre aura qui lui est attachée
Encanta a una criatura que tenga otra aura anexada a ella.
Incanta creatura con un’altra Aura assegnata ad essa
エンチャント（他のオーラがつけられているクリーチャー）
Зачаровать существо, к которому прикреплена другая Аура.
Encantar criatura com outra aura anexada a ela
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local attach_filter = Object():AttachmentFilter_Get() attach_filter:Clear() attach_filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) attach_filter:SetMinEnchantmentCount(2)

STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has first strike, vigilance, and lifelink.
La créature enchantée gagne +3/+3 et elle a l’initiative, la vigilance et le lien de vie.
La criatura encantada obtiene +3/+3 y tiene las habilidades de dañar primero, vigilancia y vínculo vital.
Die verzauberte Kreatur erhält +3/+3 sowie Erstschlag, Wachsamkeit und Lebensverknüpfung.
La creatura incantata prende +3/+3 e ha attacco improvviso, cautela e legame vitale.
エンチャントされているクリーチャーは、＋３/＋３の修整を受けるとともに先制攻撃と警戒と絆魂を持つ。
부여된 생물은 +3/+3을 받으며, 선제공격, 경계 및 생명연결 능력을 가진다.
Зачарованное существо получает +3/+3 и имеет Первый удар, Бдительность и Цепь жизни.
A criatura encantada recebe +3/+3 e tem iniciativa, vigilância e vínculo com a vida.
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local parent = Object():GetParent() if parent ~= nil then parent:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_FIRST_STRIKE, 1 ) end
local parent = Object():GetParent() if parent ~= nil then parent:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Power_Add( 3 ) parent:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Toughness_Add( 3 ) end
local parent = Object():GetParent() if parent ~= nil then parent:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_VIGILANCE, 1 ) end
local parent = Object():GetParent() if parent ~= nil then parent:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_LIFELINK, 1 ) end

SPELL_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ALLIED_ONLY, EffectController() ) filter:SetMinEnchantmentCount( 1 )
SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local target_card = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if target_card ~= nil then Object():Enchant( target_card ) end
